speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mike from XYZ Collections. Who am I speaking with today?

speaker: Agent
text: Alright, Sarah. Can you please verify your date of birth for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Thanks, but I'm not sure if you're being honest. Can you give me your address instead?

speaker: Customer
text: I live at 123 Maple Street, Springfield.

speaker: Agent
text: Fine. So you do owe us $850. How do you plan to pay it, or are you just going to ignore it like everyone else?

speaker: Customer
text: I intend to pay it, but I need a payment plan.

speaker: Agent
text: A payment plan? Seriously? You think we're running a charity here? You have to pay up now!

speaker: Customer
text: I understand your position, but I need options to manage this.

speaker: Agent
text: Options? How about you just stop being so damn lazy and settle your debt? That's an option!

speaker: Customer
text: I would appreciate it if you could speak respectfully.

speaker: Agent
text: Respectful? You think I owe you respect? Pay your damn bills and maybe I will!

speaker: Customer
text: I will escalate this conversation if it continues unprofessionally.

speaker: Agent
text: Go ahead, I really don't care. Just get your money sorted out somehow!
